content.detailedDescription:
i was sleeping and my bed is next to and under a large  window.  the venetian 

blinds were up.  i woke up at 4:26 am.   and out of the corner of my eye i saw. 

a moving light.  as i was watching i opened the window and screen.  to see 


bettar.  the moon was low in the sky i saw a trail of light thousands high

 contrail coming from my direction low in the sky traveling across from me to 

under the partial moon going under the moon. and past it towards the earth. 

 then much higher in the sky at a steeper angel a lengthening contrail 

traveling across going down from way above the moon to below it.  their was a 

very bright cluster of lights blinking at the end of the contrail of light.  the

 higher one appeared first then the lower one had a much wider trail this also


went towards the ground.  i first thought it was a meteor shower.  then as i 

watched it was acting strange the end of it the bright part of it was morphing.

  at the time i was woken up by??? and looked out the window.  i had been 

woken up by a unusual sound.   i don't know what the sound could have to do 

with the moving lights in the sky.
content.shape: Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular,  Other
content.summary: huge cluster of circles and morphing squares,  brighter than the mooon

content.detailedDescription:
Usually right around 7pm it has been coming into view. one would think it was a sattelite, but no way of knowing for certain. i attempted to take many many pictures of it, but none came back as i thought. all of the pictures had streams of light emanating from the object. 

it has been over the city of anchorage, i.E. the cook inlet, for several nights now. the other person who reported this light on the 6th mentions that even through a telescope it has streams of light emanating from it. not sure what it is, but this is the first time all winter long that it has been viewable. 

dont see how it could be a planet, its definitely within our atmosphere. sattelite maybe, but why then the streams of light? 

i have noticed that since its arrival, the local air force base, elmendorf, has been relatively quiet. actually, uncharacteristically quiet. my dad works on base and i am sure has also noticed the lack of jets in the skies over anchorage, but i havent called him to ask if he has noticed. 

not much more to add, just wanted to add the pictures. you can save the pictures, zoom in on edit, and see the streams of light i am talking about.
content.summary: Adding pictures to star-like object over anchorage night skies lately

content.detailedDescription: Large silver object partially shrouded in clouds moved from north to south across the horizon near ew tollway  88 and rte. 39  downers grove il   might have been a blimp but it seemed to large and moved to quickly  wasn't a plane .. no wings.  moved southerly and then westerly and then disappeared. wierdest thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: Object moved north to south across the horizon at a speed to fast to be a blimp.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house when all of the sudden i look up and there i see it! there was a bee hive on a tree above me. but then right by it a shape appeared out of thin air. it was kind of like the ship on startrek how it jumps to hyperspace. then it started performing wierd patterns and such. meahwhile i was frozen with terror. then it erupted with fire and a very loud obnoxious scream noise. i fell down and said ," lord almighty save the earth!" then it charged at me and swooed up and disaperred.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large, danced about the sky, loud noise, scary!

content.detailedDescription: someone needs to contact the jefferson city missouri cole county sherrifs department and ask them about the ufo their deputys and state troopers saw on the evening of march 7 2007.  i saw this object as well as a hundred people who called in and reported it,the whole incident im sure is on tape because i listened to it unfold on a police scanner as well as many other people! someone should check into this.... not a hoax i grant you!       signed  someone in the know    btw  radar from airports and weather reported no object showing no ballons launched
content.summary: Call the police,they are on tape reporting this ufo themselves

content.detailedDescription:
We were 7 witnesses in guara 1 quarter in brasilia, in a house on an extension on the second floor, which is outdoor. we had clear sky with clouds passing over. then one of the witnesses (woman) noticed a punctual object moving high in sky to the south-west and disappearing. during the event the witness called the attention of the other 6 (six) gathered in the same place of the house and we all could see the object moving away. then right after that the same first witness noticed another object stationary high in sky, more than 1.000 meters above the passing clouds almost at zenith. the object remained stationery until a cloud passed over it. when the cloud was gone the object also was gone. the first object that moved in south-west direction had the speed evaluated to be at least 300 km/h or higher when it disappeared. after the second object disappeared after the cloud passing, the second object returned in a slower speed and stopped high in sky at an altitude evaluated to be of more than 1000 meters to the south at an angle to be estimated, but i believe it to be around 70 degrees in ascension. the object remained stationery until another cloud passing over hid the object. after the cloud moved away the object was gone. 13 photos ware taken with an slrd camera, in 80mm and 300mm telephoto lenses, of the second object, the one that moved before and after. but as the camera is digital, aps sized ccd sensor, there are considerations to be taken for the true focal length, because the lenses were designed for a 35mm non-digital film.
we thought the objects could be balloon probes from the brazilian air force at jk airport in brasilia. we had contacted them by telephone and e-mail  and they said that at that given interval of time on saturday 03/03/2007 there were no meteorological balloons over brasilia. they launch balloons at 9 o'clock in the morning and at 21 o'clock in the evening. everyone was very excited about the sightings. also the meteorological service in brasilia (inmet) was contacted by telephone but they do not launch balloon probes.

i also would like to mention a previous sightings about 20 days before this one, with no photographic evidence, of three objects, two moving in parallel trajectory and blinking, and one stationery in the sky while the other went past. this time the two objects were extremely rapid, ant the stationery one disappeared after the passage of the other two.


thanks. pedro luz cunha (revista ufo consultant, cbpdv associate with a.J. gevaerd).
content.summary: Two objects sighted in day light.

content.detailedDescription: At 6:09am this morning went outside to retrieve the newspaper and looked up at the moon when i noticed two star-like objects to the left of the moon from my pov.  looking southwest.  i realized that they were in motion and moving in a uniform speed and path.  at first they appeared to be moving in a northeastern direction.  my first thought was that they were satellites.  i watched both objects moving, one just in aheaed of the other, but separated by some distance, when the object ahead faded out.  just about parallel with the position of the moon.  i was still able to see the first object when the second object reached the first object's position, but parallel and it also faded out. after about another 30 seconds i was unable to see any of the objects.  i realized that the objects were not moving in a northeastern direction, i would have seen them floating over ahead like satellites would in orbit.  have witnessed satellites in orbit before.  my conclusions was that the objects were moving straight up into the sky.  waited for several minutes to see them reappear or something, but nothing.  both objects were very easily noticeable in the sky when i first saw them.  i would think more people would have noticed them and i hope they make a report too.
content.summary: Two star-like objects moving together

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a night of ice blocking with 1 friend and i saw a light in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane but then it seemed as if it wasnt moving, and it was also chaning from an orange to a purple to a white and then red. i felt curious so i pulled my car over onto a side street and showed my friend. 2 other friends saw me on the side of the road and thought something was wrong so they pulled over. i showed them what we were watching and they got there camera out.  we took 5 pictures and four of the pictures came out completely different than the next.  it was about 12:00 or 12:30 on august 1st 2nd or 3rd.   the lights appeared to be getting bigger and smaller in size very quickly. it then would make random sperts in different directions while changing colors to purple, orange, red and white. some times it would seem as if the light would fade completely away but then show back up again in the same position it dissapeared from.  when the light became really tiny all four of us saw something shoot out from the light. it looked like a series of tinier lights coming from the light. all the lights at the time were red. as soon as it shot something out, the ufo made a rapid movement away from the series of lights and dissapeared. we were watching it for a good 30 minutes. not one of us could think of what it could be other than a ufo. i was not scared at all durring this time, i was just in awe and puzzled.
content.summary: Light changing colors and hovering over town while changing directions quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out side and noticed lights in the sky. the lights are the color of sodium vapor lights. (orange). i noticed  these about 8-10 years ago at mountain grove, missouri. these were the same lights but went off and on in a cycle. the lights appeared to be part of a circle. one would stay on for a while then up to three would come on differently but the same amount of time.  i am 59, ex-cop and pilot. i would say they were around 5000 feet up and a dime would cover the lights. this thing was huge. these lights are the same color of artillery flares. but they were not, as we have no base close. the light timing varied from 5 seconds to one second. the thing the lights were attached to moved off to the east fairly fast.  later (fifteen minutes) on i saw the same lights to the west about fifty miles away.

there was no sound. about ten minutes after i saw the last lights i called the local highway patrol (troop g) and asked them if they had any reports of lights in the sky and they cautiously stated "no". sorry to say my camcorder batteries were dead! thanks, jim
content.summary: Three bright orange lights in the sky, close

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my kitchen window and thought i saw the moon but after looking out the other side of the house the moon was over there. i watched it for about 5 minutes and it just stayed in one spot. finally it just disappeared. i don't know what i saw but it just stayed in one spot and didn't move which seemed weird. and all of a sudden it disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a bright light that was at a diagonal that stayed in one spot for 5 minutes and then just vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Driving along the las americas highway from ponce towards san juan, i saw from far away a bright light above a national guard base in the town of salinas puerto rico. i thought it was the top of a very high antenna until i got close. i parked the car and stared at it for about 15 minutes. no noise, movement, smoke etc. came from it. i got tired og waiting and got in the car and began driving again. i drove about 1,000 feet and stopped the car again because i couldn���t leave without looking some more at the light. when i stopped a second time after about 5 minutes the light began to descend towards the first low foot hills at the rear of the national guard base. the light made no noise, no smoke no side to side movements just a slow decent as if it were on a cable. when it reached the first foot hills a few miles away, i could see the trees and land clearly illuminated by the sphere of light. it descended behind the foothills and disappeared.

iam a security manager for a multinational company, an ex 1st lieutenant in the army and in the national guard and have seen all types of planes and helicopters, both day and night. i have never seen something like that before.

in ponce my mother, father and aunt along with others close to the seashore at night saw a flying disc on its side like a wheel.

a friend also in ponce at about 3am along with her adopted son saw two balls of light unite with a third ball of light and then the one light flew off.
content.summary: Saw a bright light above a national guard military base

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and i were at the corner store off of highway 78w at 7:30pm when my roommate pulled me outside and pointed to the sky. it was overcast and nothing was visible in the sky except one circular object. it had red and white lights that were alternating. it hovered in the area and then shoot upwards at 7:45pm. when we returned to the house shortly there after, we live only 2 miles behind the store. it appeared again in the same area. at our house the sky was clear you could see the planets, stars, aircrafts, and even the satellites orbiting the earth. this object was lower than satellites and in no possible a plane. it was doing circular movements, like down sideways and back up.

i dashed into the house and grabbed my new digital camera and we headed for the canal dyke area which is about the highest we can go. i took pictures and recordings of the object in the air while my roommate took his led maglight and flashed at it like morse code. amazingly enough it responded back and moved in our directions a little. we keep doing that until it went out of sight and then suddenly reappeared faintly in the distance. the footage i have is ruff, however i one recording i got the object making a downward descending.

i am a skeptic when it comes to ufo's because i have never actually experienced anything close enough for me to say "yeah that is nothing i have never seen." but i still question tonight, what was that? now i am really curious is something else really out there? could that have been a ufo and if so i wonder what it thought the blinking of my roommate's light was. the attachment is the best video i got of it. the camera is steady until 1min43s when the camera about feel off the tripod when my roommate got into the car.  the photos i took all turned out like the one i am posting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Alternating red and white lighted object on overcast sky

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving on hwy 86 (a.K.A. ajo hwy) returning to tucson from a working vacation weekend in rocky point, mexico. we had left the town of why, az and i had been driving for a while. my husband was asleep. there was no radio reception in the area and i figured it was because we were going through the reservation lands. traffic was very sparse. i was contemplating a roadside pit stop and was looking out for a likely place to turn off.  i spotted several dirt roads running perpendicular to ajo hwy but they each had a parked car, perhaps 50'from the intersection, with its headlights turned on and pointed at ajo road. it was as if they were watching something. i thought it was strange. plus, it prevented me from stopping.
i kept on driving when i noticed in my rearview mirror that everything behind me was pitch black. looking forward through my windshield was a beautiful bright starry sky. i thought it was awfully quick for a rain cloud to appear, so i turned to look behind me several more times. then i leaned forward over the steering wheel and i looked straight up.  i saw silently gliding above me a huge solid black morphing metallic ufo. it was so huge and so close (15'-25')that all i could see was a rounded nose cone with two, of what were surely many, gigantic round lights. i thought it was trying to remain unnoticed, because when i would lean forward to get a better look  i would inadvertently ease my foot off the accelerator, it would end up gliding over the automobile hood and then quickly try to pull back to my speed. i did this a few times to be sure. i just felt my adrenaline rushing. in my head i kept saying "this can't be happening" over and over and over. i stayed calm but inwardly i was extremely panicked. after two good looks,and concluding that it was real, i leaned over and awakened my husband, calmly but urgently and asked him to look too. yep, he saw it too. i remember trying to get the exact time and knowing that i would forget it, i noticed that it was dusk.  that i can remember.  for a brief moment i just gave into the helplessness of it all.  irrationally, i thought that if i would stop the car that it would be the end of us.  to continue driving would keep us safe. made no sense.

after a few minutes the space ship just shot off at "warp speed" and i got a good look at it. it stayed low and headed to and along a large mountain range.  then it disappeared.  it was about a third of the width of the mountain range-that could be a mile or more. i lighty predicted that it was headed for prescott.

once we recovered our sense of control, i tried to find a radio station but nothing came up until we were almost to kitt peak. (i think about 45 minutes) i was so sure that this was "the day the world stood still". when we got to the outskirts of tucson, the radio stations skeptically reported that there were lots of ufo sightings in pima county.  we got home at 9:55 pm and i didn't help unload the car until after the tv news was over. it's amazing that the whole incident was so successfully margionalized.
content.summary: We were driving on a 2-lane highway when we were shadowed by a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting  22:34 2/20/07 north central florida, north of gainesville by about 20 miles. 

shape ��� changed   duration ��� 45 minutes

i think i got to bed around 10:20.  after i was in bed, i had to get up and write something on the computer.  the first thing i grabbed to put on was a t- shirt given to me by  a couple who used to run the mufon of tampa/st.Pete with a green alien on it in a santa suit.  i was pleased that i had grabbed that shirt in the dark (it had not been worn since december), jumping to the conclusion that since i was getting something to put on to get up and write, the shirt (that former chapter leaders of mufon had given me), was probably electronically chipped.  (ok, so a lifelong knowledge of ufos has made me a little paranoid.  i had a daytime sighting in 1961, when i was 11 with 2 hours of missing time.)

i sat down and typed a few words.  my dogs started barking, i let them outside, noting that the clock above the door said 10:33, and i sit back down at the computer, but the barking persists and seems to beckon me outside.  it was chilly in n florida, 54 degrees, so i put on a sweater and ran outside to see what they were barking so incessantly at.  

i went outside and stood on the porch and looked up. there was a white light blinking intermittently and after about 10 seconds changing to a triangle with a light on each corner, red, green, white.  the single white light flashing light at the beginning of the sighting was about the size of 4 stars together and the triangle it turned into, the sides were as long as two aspirins at arms length   it was intermittent red, green, white,   flash...Flash������. .Flash flash flash flash.. flash  (estimation, not exact sequence) and not regular, the time between the flashes was not the same each time.  the lights were beautiful.  it danced around the sky and i said to it ���hey, wanna take me for a ride?  come get me, only this time i want to remember!���  i watched it dance around.  for a minute or two it blinked here and then there, like the cheshire cat in the right hand quadrant of my area of view.  then it went to the left and stopped and zig-zagged. it blinked out and then reappeared a few times.  it flew to the left a few inches in the sky.  at one point the triangle looked like the edges were lit up, pale yellow lines were visible on two sides, and it seemed to have an ultraviolet glow.

 then, it flew out of sight to the left, traveling about a foot at arms length, across the sky. as it disappeared behind the trees i sang ���hey, mr. spaceman���, (mcguinn).  i continued to stare at the sky hoping it would re-appear.  just to the left of the tree line, flash���flash.  large white blobs of cohesive light about aspirin size at an arm���s length and about an inch apart at an arms length.   the flashes were a couple of seconds apart bright white, except there were no rays of light coming from them.  that���s why i call them cohesive light.  and, the strangest thing, they were blobs, not round.  they were unevenly shaped and the two were not identical.  

after the white flashes, which lasted maybe 5 seconds, they winked out at the same moment, a plane flew in the same direction.  i could hear the plane. the ufo was silent.

i went back inside to write about it and looked at the clock on the computer- 11:20.  i didn���t realize until i had written for about an hour and it and it was 12:30 that i had probably had some missing time; not that that matters.  (lea hayley had an experience once where they brought her back a few minutes before she last looked at the clock.)  i figured that the sighting lasted maybe 10 minutes but not the 45 minutes that passed.

i know i should have run back inside my house to grab my camera and my watch but i was too excited to think of that.  i should have counted seconds and numbers of flashes and paid attention when the triangle was heading in one direction as to which color light was the leading one, but i didn't think about it until the sighting was over.  i have not yet drawn any pictures.  i did not have my glasses on.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing white light then triangle shaped craft with 3 lights- red, green and white

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone with an attorney and looking out the bedroom window of my second story apartment. i noticed an object that i first thought was a very large bird moving south to north approx. 1/4 mile away and approx. 1500 feet in the air, as it got closer i realized that it was not a bird nor a plane. the object moved in a straight line across the sky, it started out slow moving and then fast and back to slow. the object did not spin, rotate or change altitude while it moved. i lost visibilty when it flew into a cloud formation approx. 2 miles away. i was in shock at what i was seeing and couldn't believe it was so visible in the daytime sky, i made several explictives to the attorney i was on the phone with and ran to get my wife up from bed in hopes of seeing it again with an witness; the object never returned. the object was moving in the direction of the international airport in kansas city missouri, it was low enough to have enough visibilty to see that it was not any kind of commerical or military aircraft.
content.summary: Semi-white on bottom and chrome reflection on top,  approx. size would be that of a volkswagon

content.detailedDescription: Please go to youtube.Com and plug in "ohare lights ufo" in the search collum, i have ten minutes of video, sorry for being so shakey with the camera as i am a novus
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange lights over near ohare in chicago

content.detailedDescription:
I live in chicago, il and i believe that i saw ufos yesterday. i was running late for work and i wasn���t paying much attention to the sky as i headed to an elevated train station a few blocks away from my home. but i had just missed my train as i was climbing the stairs to the platform, at around 5:52 p.M., i knew i was definitely going to be late, because i had to be at work at 6, so i decided to relax since i was going to be late anyway. i walked to the middle of the platform, which is my favorite spot because there���s an open lot behind the station and a clear view of the sky. i listened to my mp3 player for a few minutes and for some reason i decided to turn east and face that open parking lot, this was probably at 5:56 p.M. 

when i did i noticed a round brightly lit ball just sitting in the sky. the lights didn���t blink. so at first i thought it was a plane, because i wasn���t expecting to see something different than that. i soon realized that it definitely wasn���t a plane because it was dark outside, and at night planes aren���t brightly lit, nor are they extremely visible, and this object was. planes also always move while they���re mid-air, and they���ll appear larger or smaller eventually depending on which direction it���s heading. this object didn���t move, and it appeared the same size the whole time i looked at it. then as i looked further past it, eastward, i saw two other objects that were identical to the first one. they all were in a perfectly straight line with one another, the line made a diagonal from where i was standing. all the objects in the line didn���t move either. i know they had to be miles apart realistically, but from where i was standing they only seemed about 50 ft. apart from one another. 

suddenly i saw the first object head westbound straight across the sky, it covered the distance pretty quickly, i���d say a little more quickly then the average plane would, but not astronomically so. i didn���t hear any noise as this happened. the other objects stayed in position and didn���t move. about 30 seconds after seeing this, my train arrived at my platform; this was at 6:02 p.M. i kept my eyes eastward and on the sky for the length of my trip. as soon as we���d covered about 4 or 5 blocks, i noticed that there hadn���t been two other objects behind the first one that had flown off. there had actually been 3. i saw that even though this was one was the furthest away from me, it was a brightly lit object, looking identical to those others, and it was next in the diagonal line, and it too just sat there in the sky as well.

my train headed north to the downtown section of chicago, and even as i covered at least 30 blocks worth of distance, from the original point at which i saw the objects, they were still very visible, and very bright, until some of the high rise buildings started to block my view. i know that they weren���t moving still. my trip to downtown took about 15 minutes, because i arrived at work at 6:17 p.M. as i said, a few minutes before, my view of the objects had been blocked, but my eyes were still on the sky in case there was a clearing. i didn���t see the objects again, but i did see another aircraft flying a few miles higher than me, but parallel to the train i was on. i only glimpsed it for a few seconds because the buildings blocked my view. it could have been just a plane, but it was so low, and i think there���s some sort of a no fly zone, in downtown chicago, so i don���t know why a plane would fly so close in that area. this is the only object whose shape i can���t describe really describe, it was possibly rectangular, but i didn���t get to really look at it. i just remember it flying in between one of the high rises, and it was brightly lit, but the craft itself was dark probably brown. i felt that it looked odd because it didn���t look like a plane, yet it was flying, it almost seemed to be rectangular. but it was definitely bulky and heavy, looking, and it was headed northbound, it quickly disappeared from my view, which was probably because of the buildings, not because of the object itself. i don't know what this object was, but i'm pretty sure that it wasn't a plane at all.
 
i eventually went to work for four hours but i really hoped, that the objects i���d seen by my house would still be there when i got off, so that i could show someone in my family what i���d seen. i headed home on the train and arrived at my stop at around 10:30. i didn���t remember to look at the sky when i was on the platform because i was in a rush to get home, but when i was on the ground, about a block east of the train station, i walked southeast where there���s an open area of sky because of a parking lot. as i was crossing the street and heading south, i saw one of the objects or perhaps another one that was in the same vicinity of the ones i���d seen earlier. it was way closer to the ground than the ones had been earlier. i made my way onto the sidewalk and realized that the big concrete roof of the parking lot was blocking my view. so the object had to be very close to the ground because the roof of the parking lot is only about 15-20 ft high. i decided to back up a few feet in order to walk in the street so that i could get a good look at the object. 

i did, and basically i saw an object that resembled a saucer, but it wasn���t a flat thin disc, it had layers. the top layer was full of deep burgundy lights and so was the bottom one, i think they were on but they were very dull and nearly blended into the dark sky, that���s probably why i didn���t see them earlier. but the center layer was bright, bright white. the whole object was saucer shaped, and all of the lights looked like they were framed by rectangles. so they just looked like panels of lights. whatever was holding all of these layers together wasn't very noticeable because it wasn't illuminated, but it was thin and either black, or dark gray like metal. 

i do not know if i���d imagined it from the influence of tv and movies, but i do remember thinking that it hovered and rocked a little, instead of being completely still, but that could have been my mind adding that part because i was moving and i was so excited. as i kept walking south, my view was blocked again by the roof of the parking lot, so maybe the object had moved. about 20 seconds later, i���d moved past the parking lot���s roof, and parallel to the entrance of the parking lot. the entrance of the lot isn���t enclosed by a roof, so there���s a very clear view of the sky but i still didn���t see the object. it was gone. i continued my way south and walked past the apartment building attached to the parking lot, which unfortunately blocked my view, because it too, is a high rise. 

about another 20-30 seconds later i had crossed the street from this high rise, where there are just small houses and apt. buildings, which leave a better view of the sky and i saw no objects, i headed east to get back to my building, and there still was no object in sight.  but i kept my eyes up for most of my walk and i did start to notice the stars, which i usually don���t they were visible, but since it���s chicago and we have lots of lights and air pollution they aren���t blindingly white. so when i saw another object later on, i was totally sure it wasn���t a star.

i arrived inside my apt. at around 10:35 pm. about ten minutes later i turned off the light, in my bedroom and looked out of the window. i noticed a blinking object, west of my back window, which is further south in chicago. it was much higher than the last one i���d just seen, and i would have taken it as a star if i hadn���t looked at the stars a few minutes ago when i was outside. this object was much brighter than the stars, although the light was still white; it also blinked on and off. i made out a reddish light that came from it as well. it was probably the one that i���d seen 20 minutes before, when i was outside. but i���m not sure, i couldn���t tell its shape from so far away. as i was gazing at the sky, i then saw a really large object traveling someone close to the ground, maybe 30 miles above that had a bright light attached to its bottom part. it was big and it was loud. i ran to the front of my apartment to get a better look, because it was fast and i believe this was a plane, but i do not believe it was a commercial plane, because it was so bulky, and because of the light coming from it, and because it was a dark color, i think it was a brown or bronze type of shade. it quickly covered the sky and was out of my sight within a minute or two, so i went back to the other window to see the blinking object, it was still there but it looked even further away then before it was still very bright though. so i just decided to watch some tv because i couldn���t do anything about it and then i went to bed.
content.summary: Several sightings in chicago

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were vacationing in zihuatanejo,mexico for one week. we returned from dinner to our hotel on wed. night feb.28,2007 at approximately 8:15 pm. we got a pot of coffee and sat outside on the veranda in front of our room which overlooks zihuat.Bay.
the night was perfectly clear, temp.Approx.75f .Our position was facing south toward the ocean.
at approximately 8:40 - 8:45 my wife (looking to our right west) said what is that. i immediately looked to the west to see (what was my first impression) appeared to be balloon or large canopy shaped piece of
plastic with fire burning below it rising into the air from the beach below. i thought someone had sent a balloon or plastic bag with something on fire attached below it into the air as a prank,advertisement,or just something fun to do.
as we and 2 other people in the pool next to us watched the object, i really thought it had something on fire(flameing)below it. 
the object then was coming toward us. it was heading west to east(from our right to our left).
as it came closer, i then realized this was not what i originally thought.
 firstly, there was a light breeze that night. the object was moving at a fairly slow steady unwavering pace. no movement up or down,right or left.
the entire time we watched,it kept the same steady speed never wavering.
 secondly, when the object got close enough, i could distinctly see the shape. the object was dark, but had a perfect triangular outline. it still looked like flames burning under the center in a circular dome like shape. it could possibly have been a strobing light, but looked flame- like.
 thirdly, the object made no sound. it was perfectly quiet.
we watched it for approximately 5 minutes until it dissapeared to the east. the entire time it never deviated it's speed or made any wavering movements. it was like it was on a rope. straight,steady,and perfect speed and tragectory.
on reconsideration,i believe we actually saw the object coming over the hillside from the direction of ixtapa when we first sighted it. i think at first glance it gave the illusion of rising up, but was actually moving over the hill and coming toward us.
my initial feeling was curiousity. once i could see the shape of the object and that it was not making a sound i then became more intent and somewhat in awe watching it. the fact of the matter is that i was so intent on watching this event from start to finish that i neglected to go into our room and get our camera. for this i am now kicking myself.
i have been very interested in ufo's for many years, but even though i wanted to experience an event myself, i never had. i honestly thought i probably never would. this was very surprising and exiciting.

ie: i approximated the size to be somewhat equivilant to a commercial jet aircraft, although i could not exactly judge the altitude in the night sky. the object also appeared to be following the coastline from my reference. we finally lost sight of it when one of the buildings on top of the eastern hill to our left blocked our line of sight. our angle of sight was approx. 60-70 degrees. the object was not directly overhead but fairly close so that we were able to get a good visual of it.
content.summary: Large perfect triangular object w/what looked like fire(possibly strobing lights)crossed over the bay

content.detailedDescription: Observed a bright white object ( size and shape of a tennis ball) thrveling at a 5mpr speed thru the trees out side my window.Under observation for approx 35 feet at a height of approx 6 foot off ground.The object did not illumanate the area. gave off no light but was a brilliant white in color.
content.summary: Bright white light traveling thru trees

content.detailedDescription: In may 1982, (i do not recall the exact day or date.) i had a close up day light sighting of a huge, classic disc (saucer)shaped ufo. four of my neighbors also saw it. i reported it to the police, but nothing came of that. after all these years, i decided i want to let the sighting be known for whatever good it might do in the search for the truth. i was living at 55 normandy dr. piscataway, n.J. at the time. it was at 8 pm and at that time of the year the sun is low in the western sky, but the sky is still bright and clear. i usually went out back at this time to watch the sunset. my yard ended at railroad tracks and power lines that went east and west. across a field on the opposite side of the tracks, i had a clear view of the distant watchung mountains in the northwest direction from my yard. it was a cloudless clear sky, i was facing due west. the sun had just gone behind the mountains so it did not obstruct my vision. after a while i noticed a small object in the sky coming from west to east, not far from and paralleling the power lines. it was coming directly towards me. i thought nothing of it at first. as it got closer i noticed it had an odd shape. at first i thought it was a hot air balloon. but, as it came closer and grew larger, i could see that it was in the classic shape of a flying saucer and was metalic silver in color.  it came almost directly overhead and it had to be at least 100 ft. in diameter or larger. when it was nearly overhead, about 350 yards at its closest point to me, it made a 90 degree turn and went north gaining in altitude as it went. i ran to get my neighbors. four of them came out and saw the saucer, but only after it had gained some altitude and distance so they did not see it nearly as close up as i did. they were none the less amazed at what they saw because even when they saw it, it was plain to see that it was no known conventional aircraft. there was a small local airport not too far away and my house was under major flyways for the new york and newark city area airports. usually at any given time you can go out and look up and see various normal aircraft of jet trails in the sky. on this occasion, however, the sky was oddly empty except for one small private plane (about a two to four seater) coming from the direction (west) of the local small airport. the small plane came to a distance of about half way between me and the departing ufo. even at these distances the ufo could be seen to be well over twice the length of the plane. the plane suddenly made a 180 degree curved turn about and flew back in the direction of the airport. i thought that was a strange maneuver. they may have spotted the ufo or may have been contacted by radio and told to clear the area. we watched the ufo until it faded from sight into the distance. at no time did we hear any noticable sounds at all coming from the ufo. if it made any noise at all it owuld have had to have been a low hum. later on, i told other neighbors about the sighting. naturally, they thought i was crazy. my neighbors who saw the flying saucer with me would not talk to anyone but me about it. to this day i regret that i didn't get any photos of the ufo. if i had photos to show as back up, it would have made it a lot easier for me to report this sighting. i hope that someone else in the general area may have seen it and taken photos and that these photos may turn up some day. if they already have, i would like to know about it and see those photos. i affirm that everything i have reported here is absolutely true.
content.summary: I had a daylight sighting of a disc shaped ufo that came as close as 350 yards and was100 ft. in diameter.

content.detailedDescription: We took a picture of a hazy evening sky, and the cigar shape object only appeared after downloading into the computer.  the object looks like a shadow and almost translucent.
content.summary: Photo of evening sky showed cigar shape ufo which appeared after downloading.

content.detailedDescription: Previous submittal had errors downloading the photos.
content.summary: Attaching other photos

content.detailedDescription: In the past few months we have taken photos of the sky in front of our house and a few of them had apparent ufos.  so we continue to take pictures in the same general area from time to time in the hope that we can photograph more ufos.  today was one of those lucky days.  the picture ovni3 was taken around midday,  ovni1 and ovni2 at 4pm, and ovni4 at 4.30pm.
content.summary: Took several pictures and saw objects only after downloading in the computer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my hot tub and at about 8:20pm looked up to the east to see 2 objects flying in echelon formation with the lead element to the right of his 'wingman'.  they were in what appeared to be a northernly course, slightly east of me. they traveled from the constellation of leo's throat to the handle of the big dipper in about 10 seconds. this is 53 degrees in the sky. this is about the speed i have seen low f-16's from the iowa national guard do. there was absolutely no sound, though. 

they were a dim, fuzzy orange. at first it seemed fake to me, because of the lack of brightness. it was almost as if the object was illuminated, not giving off it's own light. and if it was, it was a dim source of light when compared to the moon.  the orange in the middle was surrounded by a fuzzy white light emitting radially.  there was no tail in anyway.

they did not follow an exactly straight path. the leader was very slightly weaving back and forth. his wingman was also weaving, more noticeably, about 90 degrees out of phase from the leader. i estimate the weaving oscillation to be about 2 hz.
 
they got dimmer and smaller as they went into the distance and i lost them over the house.  the sky was clear, i could see venus setting in the west, the waning moon rising in the east, and clearly make out the constellations over head.

i am an ameteur astronomer used to looking at the sky at various things and i am also a fan of military aircraft.  this sighting still has me baffled, i have not even an idea of what it could be.

i would also like to add a past sighting to this report as it was very similar.  in april 2005, i saw 2 circular orange glowing objects pass directly over my house heading north.  they were in the same echelon formation as this 2007 sighting was.  the difference was these appeared much lower and larger.  i estimated the size to be between 1/4 and 1/2 the diameter of the moon.  each object had a pattern in the light.  it was a diffraction pattern, lines of brighter orange and dimmer orange, about 4 or 5 of each.  the lines of the pattern were about 45 degrees off the direction of travel.  i only saw these for a few seconds as they flew over my house and i grabbed my binoculars running to the front yard, but i could not reacquire them.  i did not previously report this because i only had a small window of observation, less than 3 seconds.  with the similarity to this recent sighting, i found if relevant to include this report as well.

i have attached a photo of each sighting as they appeared to me.  thanks.

troy
content.summary: 2 orange spheres near des moines, iowa flying formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting the christopher newport university campus on march 1st, due to the possiblility of my attending the university next fall.  i was planning on spending the day with some friends who were already attending the school, and hopefully hang out with them a lot while they weren't giving me the full-campus tour.  that lasted until about one or two, when we all decided to grab some lunch in the city.  after a nice drive over to newport news, we found a subway.  it wasn't so much the food choice as the scouting out of the city-life that i was interested in.  on the way over we noticed a nice looking park, and decided, that after spending the rest of the day there we would go over at night and play some flashlight tag.  
night did come, and after exploring much of the city, we all managed to purchase 5 flashlights for each of us.  about an hour into playing the game, i looked up into the sky, because i noticed that the moon seemed noticably brighter.  after analysing the sky for a few moments i realized that the brightness was actually comming from a shape in the sky, maybe 100 yards up.
the first reaction i had to the incident was to tell my friends, and make sure i wasn't seeing things, but sure enough, they were looking at it too.  the object, shaped like a cigar, was glowing all over, with only the base showing a circular area of glowing red and white lights.
as i looked at the lights, i felt strangely tranquil, and couldn't move from the position that i was standing.  the aparatus then began to bounce in the air, before darting across the sky much faster than any craft that i have seen before.
content.summary: Ufo incident near local college cnu.  cigar-shaped craft sighted.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was attempting to get film of deer across the street around dusk. i am now putting the vhs tapes on dvd and saw this object while i was recording to dvd.The object is between 2 houses across the street and is visable for about 15 seconds and then my wife locates the deer and then pans up briefly to see that the object is gone.Again she did not see this when filming.It is a clear cloudless day and the object is huvering and moves slighly backwards and up and down.




 i am not able to send the video email but would like to send it by mail on a dvd and have someone look at it to see if it is anything of interest to you as it is for me and my friends and family.
content.summary: I have film of object in sky.Did not see it until watched vhs tape.

content.detailedDescription: Officer recovered a coyote body, looks like a classic "cattle mutilation" style event. who can this be reported to etc.. does anyone care?.  james
content.summary: Animal mutilations

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a skeptic, and i don't know what this was. i haven't read any accounts like this is any ufo-related book, so i'll just tell it like i saw it. my husband j (then boyfriend) and i were driving from colorado to santa fe to visit some friends. it was maybe 2 o'clock in the morning. that stretch of highway (between raton and las vegas, nm) was pretty empty at that hour, two lanes of highway in each direction, divided by a wide grassy median. that's why i immediately noticed two lights pop up behind me out of, what seemed like, nowhere. i thought it must be a cop that had pulled out from a hiding spot. this area is empty prairie. no trees, no nothing, and you can see for miles. but the lights were rather far apart, so i began to think it was two motorcycles or a really old classic car. they were not entirely round, more like horizontally elliptical, if that makes sense. they looked a bit different than traditional modern headlights. i'm not a good judge of distance. the lights weren't threateningly close, but close enough that i wondered if they'd ever pass me. there were no other cars around at all, so i was paying close attention. i mentioned the lights to j and he started watching them in the sideview. they really just looked like headlights, moving in unison, just farther apart than normal headlights and there was no sound. i honestly don't remember if they were yellow or white. i wish i could. anyway, they followed me for maybe 5 minutes and then they seemed to turn upward and disappeared in a blink. i said "did you see that?" and j said "yeah" so i slowed down and tried to decide what to do. being followed by headlights isn't weird, but this experience felt very weird so i actually pulled over, then drove across the median and headed the other way. there was nothing. and i would have noticed something, anything out there because it's just empty, rolling hills. no sign of any car. no car heading the other way. no car on the side of the road. so i got back on the highway going the right direction and drove on. i hadn't taken any drugs, hadn't been drinking, wasn't very sleepy. in fact, that's about as wide awake as i've ever felt in my life, when those lights disappeared. j and i drove on in complete silence for a long time, maybe 20 minutes, then both kinda said "what the hell was that!?" and "i have no idea" at the same time and rolled down the windows to look up frantically at the sky. we both had a "hey, come back" attitude at that point, even though neither of us ever said the word ufo or alien. we only referred to the "incident" a few times because all of our friends and family are skeptical, educated people.

even just remembering this event, i have nervous chills. obviously, anyone would ignore it as an incident easily explained. two lights on a highway. big deal. but i looked. i looked everywhere. the lights came out of nowhere and disappeared. i'm a secularist, not prone to belief in anything unprovable or "supernatural," but headlights don't turn upward and disappear. they just don't. and i was watching closely. and even though i tried to brush it off, i felt profoundly changed by the experience. i was even sad about getting rid of my old car because i thought "well, that's the only way they could identify me. that license plate was my address, of sorts." i know. it sounds crazy.
content.summary: Followed by two lights on deserted highway

content.detailedDescription:
One night about 1;15 am , i stepped outside of my apartment for a breath of fresh air, and and did not see anyone out at that time.Across  the street is a large parking lot and a highway and then a hillside to the freeway. i looked down for a second and then looked up again and saw what seemed to be a large 8-foot wide and 8-foot in height large round ball of orange see through plasma. not believing my eyes,i looked away for a second to rub eyes,then i looked again and it was still there in the same position .I looked around to get someones attention but no one was i sight.Do not know if the cars on the freeway even noticed it. 
well i stared at it for a little longer,when right about that time it just blinked out as if it was never there,but i know it was there. 

a woman walked from the side of one the buildings ,and as she did,the object blinked out as if it did not want her to see it. haven't seen the object since but i look for it everynight. the only other thing that i would like to add is that the object seemed to be floating about at least 2 to 3 feet off of the grassy area of the freeway hillside .
content.summary: Standing on my patio one night i look up and see an orange round large ball,sitting in one position.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern, 
i want to know if anyone can recall or seen anything unusual in the night skies of march 1, 2007 aprox around 7:55pm/ 8pm. night was dark, and clear skies. 
i was in the back porch smoking a cigarette, and the porch faces north. 
what i seen can not be explain. and it did not have the movements or the usual blinking green and red lites seen on a conventional plane or helicopter. 
these were big circular light balls 
i drew a quick (child like picture) only to not forget the event with my computer basic paint shop program. 
here is the explanation of what i saw. 
# ! seen the yellowish/ orange circular lites in the triangular pattern. steady and not moving. 
# 2 seeing the same pattern, but now pulsating real bright, as if throwing sun rays. steady and not moving 
# 3 returns to normal (or # 1) steady and not moving 
# 4 triangle pattern disappear or turns into a ball of white lite 
# 5 white ball of lite pulses real bright white for a quick second. 
# 6 white ball (bottom right hand corner of sky) shoots upward and outward in the east/northeast direction. in another quick second. 
# 7 white ball of lite is much smaller now, reaches (upper left hand corner of sky) 
# 8 white ball pulses bright again 
# 9 returns to normal small white ball 
# 10 white ball disappeared, reappears are the yellowish/ orange circular lites in the triangular pattern. steady and not moving 
# 11 the yellowish/ orange circular lites in the triangular pattern pulse again, as if throwing sun rays. steady and not moving 
# 12 returns to its normal color and pattern steady and not moving 
# 13 disappear, as if someone turn off a light in a room. 
in explanation number six i live in the town of valaparaiso, indiana. it seem like the lite figure could have been possibly hovering (yellowish orange) over the town of portage or chesterton and/ or going in that direction (white ball of lite) 
this lite show, was about one minute or shy of a minute.
content.summary: Pulsating lites
